events.name: Japan to develop long-range missiles
events.wd_description: Japan announced plans to develop long-range missiles due to increased tension with China. The Ministry of Defense signed contracts with Mitsubishi Heavy Industries (MHI) for the development and mass production of these weapons.
events.description: Japan announced plans to develop long-range missiles due to increased tension with China. The Ministry of Defense signed contracts with Mitsubishi Heavy Industries (MHI) for the development and mass production of these weapons.

events.name: Contract details
events.wd_description: The Ministry of Defense in Japan signed contracts with MHI worth more than $2.8 billion for a development and production plan extending to 2027.
events.description: The Ministry of Defense in Japan signed contracts with MHI worth more than $2.8 billion for a development and production plan extending to 2027.

events.name: Mass production of missiles
events.wd_description: MHI will begin mass production of two types of missiles this year: ground-launched Type 12 guided missiles for targeting ships and hypersonic glide missiles for island defense.
events.description: MHI will begin mass production of two types of missiles this year: ground-launched Type 12 guided missiles for targeting ships and hypersonic glide missiles for island defense.

events.name: Development of submarine-launched missiles
events.wd_description: MHI is expected to begin developing submarine-launched missiles for the Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force's fleet of conventionally powered boats.
events.description: MHI is expected to begin developing submarine-launched missiles for the Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force's fleet of conventionally powered boats.

events.name: Deadly Wildfires Ravage Russia's Ural Highlands and Siberia
events.wd_label: Deadly Wildfires Ravage Russia's Ural Highlands and Siberia
events.wd_description: Wildfires in Russia's Ural highlands and Siberia have claimed the lives of at least 21 people, with most victims being elderly individuals unable to evacuate their homes. The fires, fueled by arid summers and high temperatures, have led to widespread destruction.
events.description: Wildfires in Russia's Ural highlands and Siberia have claimed the lives of at least 21 people, with most victims being elderly individuals unable to evacuate their homes. The fires, fueled by arid summers and high temperatures, have led to widespread destruction.

events.name: Wildfires in Ural Highlands and Siberia
events.wd_label: Wildfires in Ural Highlands and Siberia
events.wd_description: Wildfires have spread across the Ural highlands and Siberia, fueled by dry summers and high temperatures, with significant damage reported in the Kurgan and Sverdlovsk provinces and parts of Siberia.
events.description: Wildfires have spread across the Ural highlands and Siberia, fueled by dry summers and high temperatures, with significant damage reported in the Kurgan and Sverdlovsk provinces and parts of Siberia.

events.name: Death Toll and Impact on Vulnerable Populations
events.wd_label: Death Toll and Impact on Vulnerable Populations
events.wd_description: At least 21 people, many of them elderly, have perished in the wildfires, with most of the deaths occurring in the village of Yuldus in Kurgan province. The death toll is expected to rise.
events.description: At least 21 people, many of them elderly, have perished in the wildfires, with most of the deaths occurring in the village of Yuldus in Kurgan province. The death toll is expected to rise.

events.name: State of Emergency and Ongoing Threat
events.wd_label: State of Emergency and Ongoing Threat
events.wd_description: A state of emergency has been declared in Kurgan province, where over 5,000 structures have been destroyed by the fires. Thousands of hectares have also been burned in Sverdlovsk province and parts of Siberia.
events.description: A state of emergency has been declared in Kurgan province, where over 5,000 structures have been destroyed by the fires. Thousands of hectares have also been burned in Sverdlovsk province and parts of Siberia.

events.name: G7 calls for extension of Ukrainian grain export deal
events.wd_label: G7 calls for extension of Ukrainian grain export deal
events.wd_description: The G7 agriculture ministers called for the extension, expansion, and full implementation of the deal to export Ukrainian grain through the Black Sea.
events.description: The G7 agriculture ministers called for the extension, expansion, and full implementation of the deal to export Ukrainian grain through the Black Sea.

events.name: Details of the grain export deal
events.wd_label: Details of the grain export deal
events.wd_description: The deal, brokered by the United Nations and Turkey, was signed in Istanbul last July, allowing Ukraine to export more than 27 million tons of grain from several Black Sea ports.
events.description: The deal, brokered by the United Nations and Turkey, was signed in Istanbul last July, allowing Ukraine to export more than 27 million tons of grain from several Black Sea ports.

events.name: G7 communique
events.wd_description: After a two-day meeting in Japan, the G7 agricultural ministers recognized the importance of the continuation and full implementation of the Black Sea Grain Initiative.
events.description: After a two-day meeting in Japan, the G7 agricultural ministers recognized the importance of the continuation and full implementation of the Black Sea Grain Initiative.

events.name: Upcoming meeting
events.wd_description: A meeting is scheduled this week between the Russian Foreign Minister and U.N. Secretary-General to discuss the Ukrainian Black Sea export deal.
events.description: A meeting is scheduled this week between the Russian Foreign Minister and U.N. Secretary-General to discuss the Ukrainian Black Sea export deal.

events.name: G7 support for Ukraine
events.wd_description: The G7 members are prepared to support the recovery and reconstruction of Ukraine, including providing expertise in de-mining agricultural land and rebuilding agricultural infrastructure.
events.description: The G7 members are prepared to support the recovery and reconstruction of Ukraine, including providing expertise in de-mining agricultural land and rebuilding agricultural infrastructure.

events.name: BMW's battery assembly plant in South Carolina
events.wd_label: BMW's battery assembly plant in South Carolina
events.wd_description: BMW Group's new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina, set to begin production in 2026, will be key to reducing logistics costs and risks in EV production.
events.description: BMW Group's new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina, set to begin production in 2026, will be key to reducing logistics costs and risks in EV production.

events.name: Plant groundbreaking
events.wd_description: Executives broke ground this week for the new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina.
events.description: Executives broke ground this week for the new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina.

events.name: Role in supply chain
events.wd_description: The plant will be an important hub in an integrated, localized supply chain for electric vehicle production for BMW globally.
events.description: The plant will be an important hub in an integrated, localized supply chain for electric vehicle production for BMW globally.
